Module project
Package cafeGUI

Class Donuts

java.lang.Object
cafeGUI.MenuItem
cafeGUI.Donuts
All Implemented Interfaces:
Customizable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CakeDonut, DonutHoleDonut, YeastDonut
public abstract class Donuts
extends MenuItem
implements Customizable
The Donut Class allows the user to create a Donut object. Also allows access to add flavors to the donut.
Author:
Muhammad Faizan Saiyed, Michael Neustater
